VLIB Function Reference

Triangulation

Introduction and Use Cases

Triangulation is the method to estimate 3D point from its tracked locations in images. Triangulation needs camera pose information along with its tracked locations. Minimum two frames tracked locations are needed to estimate a 3D point, however this API can take more than 2 frames tracked locaitons to have better estimates of 3D points.

Specification

Method

See the APIs of each function to see the method of each.

APIS

  • VLIB_triangulatePoints

References
